nl: Prove that subgroups of a solvable group are solvable.
lean:
∀ {G : Type*} [Group G]
  (H : Subgroup G) [IsSolvable G], IsSolvable H
candidate: ∀ {G : Type*} [Group G] {H : Subgroup G} (hG : IsSolvable G), IsSolvable H
imports:
import Mathlib

open Fintype Subgroup Set Polynomial Ideal
open scoped BigOperators
